answers.answer: Good luck mama ull be fine
Good luck mama ull be fine
I pray you have a blessed and uneventful delivery.  Just remember you'll have a new life in your arms tomorrow.

If it makes you feel any better my second csection want near as  rough as my first csection. I've heard a l8r odd moms say the second isn't as bad, it us the first one that really *****. At least you know what to expect this time! Good luck!
Thank you ladies ur words made me feel better... good luck to you too :-)
I agree with the second being better... My ob herself had two and she said The second was better. I'm having my second in 44 days and I was worried too but just try to relax

Aw...honey. I'm sorry you're feeling like this. I understand. ..I had my first baby 5 yrs ago and she wad a c/s. It was under horrible stress, I hadpreeclampsia, and had undergone a failed induction and then had to have surgery. My son was a scheduled c/s....it was SO much more pleasant. I knew when I was going in....I knew exactly what would happen....it'll be better I think just because you're more prepared.  Anyway...thinkin of you!  You got this mama!!

question: Hi ladies im having me csection tomorrow im so scared and sleepless i spent the whole day crying i had a csection before (5years ago) it was awful im worried this one will be the same... on top of thatWe just moved to a new city which is 13 hours away from all my family and friends ;-( plz pray for me
title: due tomorrow
